name: Marine Depths - Unknown Beauty
description:
Welcome to Marine Depth : Unknown Beauty, a 2D Platformer game made on Phaser 3 for my first year of Game Design Studies at ETPA.

Game is made to be played fullscreen.

You play as a diver sent in the watery abyss of our planet to find proof of an ancient civilisation.

Dive into this immersive experience, where you'll encounter known flora and wildlife (not to disturb) and maybe more.
Be wary of your oxygen level as you dive, since it is not unlimited, and good luck finding proof that this civilisation existed !

Musics :  
    - Menus : Sunset by Kai Engel
    - Tutorial : Summer Days by Kai Engel
    - Level 1 : Blur by Kai Engel
    - Level 2 : Oneiri by Kai Engel
